name: Hilltop Funeral
description:
In Hilltop Funeral, you play Bonko and Slappy, a pair of unemployed clowns.   
Life has been a struggle since the circus shut down, but they just had a new idea: starting a funeral home!   
However, on a particularly windy day, their first customer (RIP) gets tossed down a hill. 
Now the two clowns have to rush the body back to the top of the hill in time for the funeral. 
Tread carefully, keep the body balanced, and don’t be late!

This game was produced for educational purposes.

Content Warning: Death


HOW TO PLAY:

Use WASD control for movement and use Arrow keys for balancing.
